observationText: The miR-155 -/-;Nf1flox/flox ;DhhCre mice exhibited smaller plexiform neurofibromas, reduced tumor number, and prolonged survival compared to miR-155 +/-;Nf1flox/flox ;DhhCre control mice.
The miR-155 -/-;Nf1flox/flox ;DhhCre mice showed decreased proliferation and increased apoptosis in plexiform neurofibromas compared to miR-155 +/-;Nf1flox/flox ;DhhCre controls.
The miR-155 -/-;Nf1flox/flox ;DhhCre mice showed decreased expression of the miR-155 target gene Maf in plexiform neurofibromas compared to Nf1flox/flox ;DhhCre controls.

Administration of anti-miR-155 peptide nucleic acids loaded nanoparticles marginally reduced plexiform neurofibroma numbers in the miR-155 -/-;Nf1flox/flox ;DhhCre mice but did not affect growth of established tumors.
